summary: Replaces the Nirnroot's humming with Darkfox127
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#980000][size=4]Description[/size][/color]
[size=3]Simply replaces the Nirnroot's humming to audio of Darkfox127. Two different versions, one is of him being the Nirnroot and another is of him crying.[/size]

[youtube]naM7HrFoMrE[/youtube]

[color=#f4f4f4]Heads up to Immersive Sounds users, according toÂ dunc001, the mod alters the file path from /itm to /itm_is, so keep that in mind, fixing the problem is as easy a moving Nirnroot_LP.wav to the newly made /itm_is created by Immersive Sounds.[/color]


[color=#980000]Credits:[/color]
[url=https://www.darkfox127.co.uk/][color=#980000]Darkfox127[/color][/url][size=3]-For such glorious voice acting[/size][/center]
author: Redd
